text.description:
X Fourtress
https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/636
This is not the greatest mod in the world, this is just a tribute to Dwarf Fortress:
============
The mod adds dedicated history to all ships and stations in the game.
A new 'History' tab is available in the Ship Information, giving a timeline overview of the events this unit was involved in.
Depending on their history, ships have a chance to be renamed in their honour or shame.
